flavorText: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. "Glok," he mumbled, and hid.
name: Legerdemain
originalText: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it.

rulings.text: You can’t cast Legerdemain unless both targets share a type at that time. It will also check to make sure they share a type as it resolves. If they no longer do so, the exchange will not occur.

text: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
